From: (USANYS)" 
To: 
Cc: ' 
Subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] RE: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell 
Date: Wed, 20 Oct 2021 18:03:03 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.10.19 Order re October 21 Teleconference.pdf 
Thanks very much, You and can access tomorrow's conference by calling and dialing access 
code . Per the attached order from the Court, to the extent others would like to access the conference, they 
should use the public dial-in provided in the Court's order and using access code 
Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 2021 11:11 AM 
To: 
(USANYS) < 
Cc:
Subject: Re: [EXTERNAL) RE: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell 
Yes my apologies. 
Get Outlook for iOS 
will call from her cell .  I will call from 
From: 
(USANYS) 
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 2021 9:06:32 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: [EXTERNAL) RE: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell 
C 
can you please send along the phone numbers that you and will be using to call into the conference? We 
need to provide those to the court. Thanks very much. 
On Oct 18, 2021, at 5:39 PM, 
> wrote:
(USANYS) < 
Thanks, Can you please let us know the phone numbers from which you both will be calling for the conference 
this week? We will get back to you on your question about the November 1 conference. 
Thanks for reaching out about additional meeting times. I will circle back to you with some dates that work for us to 
meet with 
Thanks so much, 
On Oct 18, 2021, at 3:34 PM, 
> 
wrote: 
EFTA00032799

Hello both myself and would like to be on by phone for the October 21st hearing. will not be able to 
be in NYC on November 1st and she is wondering if there will be a phone option for that hearing as well? 
also asked if you could give her some dates for additional prep times so she can be ready for the trial. I told her 
you are of course very busy right now but I am sure will work in some times to meet. 
Thank you, 
Partner 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 2021 11:07 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell 
I hope all is well. There are two upcoming court appearances in this case: a teleconference on October 21 at 12 pm 
EST and an in-person pretrial conference on November 1 at 11 am. Can you please let us know tomorrow if 
plans to listen to the October 21 teleconference? Can you also please let us know if she plans to attend the November 
1 in-person conference? 
I'm happy to give you a call tomorrow if there's anything you would like to discuss. 
Thanks very much, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
Tel:
